entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
